item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): A New Arrival from Seattle en Route to Australia
item.description:
An Australian customer purchased a Beogram 4002 on eBay from the US and sent it to me for restoration. Upon its arrival, I discovered it was in poor condition, likely due to storage in a basement or attic. The dust cover was particularly damaged, with scratches on the aluminum trim and the surface itself. Despite the dust cover’s condition, the internal components appeared undamaged, including the hinges, suggesting a successful restoration is possible...
